resources.string: Allow this app to use Download Manager and download files through it. Malicious apps may take this to interrupt downloading and access private information.
Allow this app to use the advanced features of Download Manager. Malicious apps may take this to interrupt downloading and access private information.
Allow this app to send notifications when download is completed. Malicious apps may take this to disguise as other apps that download files.
View all downloads to be saved to a USB storage device
"Allow this app to view all contents downloaded to the SD card (regardless the app used to download). "
Keep the space in the download cache
"Allow this app to download the files to the download cache (the system will not automatically delete the contents in the download cache because of more space needed by the Download Manager). "
Download files directly and do not display notifications
Allow this app to download files through the Download Manager without displaying any notifications to the user.
Allow this app to view and modify all the contents downloaded by any app on your system.
The file is too large. You need to download it a Wi-Fi network.
The file is too large and not suitable for downloading over a cellular network.

"You need to connect to a Wi-Fi network to download this file (%s).
Tap %s to download it next time when you connect to a Wi-Fi network."

"Downloading this file (%s) now may drain the battery and/or use excessive mobile data (which may incur charges by your carrier depending on your data plan).
Tap %s to download it next time when you connect to a Wi-Fi network."
File cannot be downloaded. Please clear some space and try again.
